legend_event_general_ch0140_00_sakaki/51:
Ah! [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Are you on your way out to do some exploring?

If you were thinking of heading to the beach,
please be careful. I just got a concerning report
from the tournament staff.

It sounds like an incredibly powerful sync pair
is stirring up trouble around there.

When the staff went to investigate, they were
totally overwhelmed.
Be on the lookout for trouble, OK?
legend_event_general_ch0140_00_sakaki/52:
Something must be
going on at the beach.

According to Trista, something suspicious is
going on at the beach right now involving a
powerful sync pair.

I’ve got a bad feeling about this...
I think we should get down there and investigate.
Are you with me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?

What’s going on with that
suspicious sync pair?

You’re going to investigate the area around the
beach, right? I can be your guide if you want!

If we run into any crooks down there,
Starmie and I will teach them a lesson!
